SC4 part number:
(2) Clause: 10303-1250
(3) Paragraph: 4.3
(5) Comment:
A slot is only a specific view of a product. It is not a product or product_version by its own.
(6) Proposal:
Totally re-model this module. Make entity slot a subtype of product_view_definition. Don't have specific subtypes from product and product_version.
The industrial requirements of the PLCS member companies have identified the requirement to identify and track versions of an attachment slot. The slots have independently identified requirements and configuration histories. Hence the subtyping of product and product version.
For example, a military aircraft has a number of hard points to which various pylons can be attached which can carry a number of role equipments such as sensors, missiles, long range fuel tanks. During the life cycle of the aircraft, the attachment points on the pylon may evolve to provide more capability. E.g. be versioned.
